author: Anthony Spadafora
title: SEC steps in to prevent investors from buying the wrong Zoom
description: The SEC has suspended the shares of Zoom Technologies as many investors thought they were buying shares of Zoom Video Communications instead.
content:
The US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has taken action by suspending the shares of a small Chinese company called Zoom Technologies after investors were confusing it with the video-calling app Zoom.
The regulator recently revealed that it was halti… [+1585 chars]
